metadata.title: CVE-2022-45198 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Pillow before 9.2.0 performs Improper Handling of Highly Compressed GIFData (Data Amplification).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45198` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.7
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-4ubuntu0.7').
pillow-python2 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
